taskDescription: When a 2,6-disubstituted allyl phenyl ether is heated in an attempted Claisen rearrangement, migration occurs to give the p-allyl product as the result of two sequential pericyclic reactions. Explain.
detailedSolution: Claisen rearrangement is followed by a Cope rearrangement.
